title: If I HAD to Have Kids - Gregway Episode 27
description:
If I screw everything up and have kids, ... God, I can't even think about it. It's too scary.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to AG gregway every Wednesday and Friday I answer a question submitted by you in the comments on these YouTube videos or from the tweets on my Twitter today's question comes from Graham gamy grimy doesn't spell his name normal not my problem Grammy here says in an alternate universe where Greg Miller wants children what would you call them and would you encourage them to game everybody knows I don't want kids kids suck kids are bad all the responsibility I want weener dogs Portillo's easy you take care of them I didn't train him well he's not even trained well but he's still a good dog aren't you buddy but the world where I have children where I've just up every decision and ended up with kids huh I've always liked the named Abigail Abby Abigail solid name for a kid solid name for a human being she seems like she'd stand up come for tell don't screw with the mic Abigail's a good one as far as a boy never thought about it don't want him seven like in like

a kid solid name for a human being she seems like she'd stand up come for tell don't screw with the mic Abigail's a good one as far as a boy never thought about it don't want him seven like in like from Seinfeld that seems like a good one good enough would I encourage the children to game of course I would I would like that's the one thing right now about having uh having friends whove up their lives and had kids I get to be cool Uncle Greg right where I just show up and I just walk in I'm like toys and I give them all like I make it R action figures on them and stuff like that uh when they're old enough I will guarantee I'll be buying them PlayStations and Xboxes and vas and whatever the next handheld is like I want to SK few these children to become people I'd want to talk to if these kids only want to talk about soccer or some other like that like get the out of here so you got to start young like same thing with like missou right like these kids like I buy like when they're babies

only want to talk about soccer or some other like that like get the out of here so you got to start young like same thing with like missou right like these kids like I buy like when they're babies I buy them missou onesies and granted they live in Illinois but that's close enough I'm trying to you know get that get it going get get the roots in nice and young so that they go somewhere I care about so that I have a reason to talk to them when they are 18 otherwise get out of here oh how's your baseball team doing great how fast did you run the the 470 today that sounds good you got a good old cross country future he I guess no you got to you got to warp children people warp him the wrong way into bad things you know and put out cigarettes and stuff on them or whatever don't do that but give them comic books give them video games make them become the people you want now granted this might drive them away from it right you give them all the stuff for things you'd want them to be into

give them comic books give them video games make them become the people you want now granted this might drive them away from it right you give them all the stuff for things you'd want them to be into maybe they decide that's not what it's for me again you're washing out kids you want to hang out with anyway do what you want get these kids to become the people you want otherwise you have no reason to talk to them and you're stuck with him for 18 years so that's another Greg way in the books remember leave your question for me in the comments below or tweet them at me and then come back every Wednesday and Friday to see what crazy I'm going to say on gregway
